document.masterDocTitle: Review of the planthopper genus Ommatissus Fieber (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Tropiduchidae) with descriptions of three new species from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the planthopper genus Ommatissus Fieber (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Tropiduchidae) with descriptions of three new species from China

subSubSection.paragraph: Description. Body length (from apex of vertex to tip of forewings): Brachypterous: male 3.9–4.2 mm , female 4.2–4.4 mm ; Macropterous: male 4.5–5.1 mm , female 4.9–5.1 mm .
